Script for Mercury

Room 7 – mercury motors

[MERC1] Mercury: ITS IS I, MERCURY, GOD OF COMMERCE,TRICKERY, bla bla whatever!
[MERC2] Mercury: Wait, just one of you?
[MERC3] Mercury: It's been a long time since I've had a worshipper.
[MERC4] Mercury: Here. Take this.
[MERC5] Mercury: Have a nice day!
Narrator: Nothing happens.
Debra: I've talked to Mercury enough today.
